column4: my new compiled kernel 2.6 writes: Kernel panic - not syncing : VFS: Unable to mount root fs on unknown-block(0,0). How to fix it?
you might not have ext3 selected as compilied in or module. If its SATA drive it might be something scsi too
I get an error with gcc 3.4 and 4.0.1 compiling any kernel, fails on malloc.o for sound. Last time I compilied I was missing ext3
I get an error with gcc 3.4 and 4.0.1 compiling any kernel, fails on malloc.o for sound. Last time I compilied I was missing ext3\reiser
